response.body: {"a-random-uuid": "{{ alfred.random.RandomUUID }}","a-random-first-name": "{{ alfred.random.randomPersonFirstName }}", "a-random-number": "{{ alfred.random.randomIntBetween(1,10) }}","the-same-random-number": "{{ alfred.random.randomIntBetween(1,10) }}","a-new-random-number": "{{ alfred.random.randomIntBetween(1,10) @name:'last-random' }}", "a-random-address-city":"{{ alfred.random.RandomAddressCity }}", "a-random-lorem-sentence":"{{ alfred.random.RandomLoremSentences }}"}
